name: Computer Vision Demo
description:
Little computer viz demo (Linux) of the new computer vision plugin that performs object detection using the mobilenet-ssd model. Created and published in the latest (unreleased) version of the SimulationStarterKit editor with just a few clicks. No coding just choose the model, configure the inputs, define a simple GUI and wire it up to the inputs and off you go!

Simply:

  • Download and run the AppImage (you may need to make it executable depending on your linux distro)
  • Choose the connected capture device and start detecting
